original_text: Then Herod and his soldiers started to laugh at Jesus. They were saying things to make him feel bad. They put a beautiful coat on him. Then they sent him back to Pilate.
korean_text: 헤롯이 그 군인들과 함께 예수를 업신여기며 희롱하고 빛난 옷을 입혀 빌라도에게 도로 보내니

sentences.original_text: Then Herod and his soldiers started to laugh at Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 헤롯과 그의 병사들은 예수를 비웃기 시작했습니다

sentences.original_text: They were saying things to make him feel bad
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 기분 나쁘게 만드는 말을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They put a beautiful coat on him
Then they sent him back to Pilate
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 그를 빌라도에게 다시 보냈습니다
